column4: Can someone help me figure out what's going wrong with my attempt at a fresh Ubuntu install?
I'm trying to install 8.04, and it goes through the initial screens but then drops me on a console with no xserver.
No, I mean 8.04. I'm using a dell mini 10, and the 9.04 drivers aren't compatible so I'm trying to use the version dell releases. It's the Intel GMA 500 chip.
Did you check the integrity of the CD?
